mapper.insert: insert into supplier_${storeId} (id, name, advance_money, contacts, contact_number, contact_address, fax, remark) values (#{id}, #{name}, 0, #{contacts}, #{contactNumber}, #{contactAddress}, #{fax}, #{remark});
mapper.select:
select COUNT(0) from supplier_${storeId} where 1 = 1
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%');
select id, name, advance_money, contacts, contact_number, contact_address, fax, remark from supplier_${storeId};
select id, name, advance_money, contacts, contact_number, contact_address, fax, remark from supplier_${storeId} where id = #{id};
